You can order, print and sign your permit from the comfort of your own home 24/7! You can also purchase it at various Canada Post outlets and independent vendors across Canada.

A strong, modern and flexible NAFTA is important for North America to maintain its competitiveness in an increasingly complex and connected global marketplace.
  
NAFTA has had a positive effect on the Canadian economy, and has opened up export opportunities, while helping attract significant foreign investment. A modernized NAFTA will bring existing labour and environmental provisions in line with Canada‚Äôs recent agreements, which will reflect the Government‚Äôs commitment to a progressive trade agenda.

caption_original:
Do you live in Atlantic Canada? What do you love most about it? Is it:

- Coastal living? 
- Easy access to nature and wildlife at our many beaches, forests, and parks?
- Hiking through rugged and pristine landscapes?
- Friendly people and a close-knit community? 

If you said yes to one or more of these activities you might want to join us in the Atlantic Canada Shorebird Survey (ACSS)!   Volunteer bird watchers help us by gathering vital information that helps the Canadian Wildlife Service (CWS) to better understand the migratory birds that stop-over along our shores on the East Coast. http://ow.ly/Uqin30eBrqg

If you said yes to one or more of these activities you might want to join us in the Atlantic Canada Shorebird Survey (ACSS)! Last week was the first deadline to apply for funding through the Environmental Damages Fund (EDF). There‚Äôs still more available! If you‚Äôre in Northern Qu√©bec or Labrador regions, EDF still has $3.45M in funding available until October 31.

A Qu√©bec company was ordered to pay $7.5M after pleading guilty to 45 charges under the Fisheries Act. This is the largest penalty ever given for an environmental infraction. Environment and Climate Change Canada puts a lot of consideration into where the funds go. Of that $7.5M, $6.83 was directed to EDF and today $3.45 is available to fund projects that will benefit the affected area.

For more information about this Fund and to find out if your project qualifies for funding, click here: http://ow.ly/Cbb130e4RtF
